data.prayer: Father, help your children in Cayey, Puerto Rico find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cayey, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Cayey, Puerto Rico to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 13,818 believers in Cayey, Puerto Rico a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, please provide access to your Word for everyone, especially believers in Cayey, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cayey
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cayey, Cayey, Puerto Rico.
Lord, make the 13,818 believers in Cayey to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 28,682 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Cayey. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cayey, Puerto Rico has a population of 42,500.

We estimate Cayey has 13,818 people who might know Jesus, 26,365 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,317 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Cayey, Puerto Rico today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
